subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Athletics and Sports
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Danny Green is among the most improved players in college basketball this season and is a reason North Carolina entered Sunday’s game against Rutgers ranked No. 1 in the country.
snippet: Danny Green is among the most improved players in college basketball this season and is a reason North Carolina entered Sunday’s game against Rutgers ranked No. 1 in the country.
